channel.title: Godot on SD
channel.description: Recent content in Godot on SD

item.title: Wolves vs Zombies
item.description: Departing the Undeads Wolves vs. Zombies is a shoot’em’up (shmup) where the player must pilot their aircraft and guide their fellow villagers to safety. The autogyro-style aircraft fires forward giving the player a way to remove undead obstacles and rescue the villagers from a frightful fate. Project goals There were a few overlapping priorities for developing this game. The first priority was reaching something resembling a completed game. This goal is about learning and practice and differentiates the game from the prototype and gamejam projects I have developed previously.
